DOC.brief_summary: This study compare effect Individualized Scheduled Telephone Support ( ISTS ) Usual Care ( UC ) service member Mild Traumatic Brain Injury ( mTBI ) . A total 400 service member participate study . ISTS telephone intervention provide injury-related education , train problem solving , focus behavioral strategy problem ( e.g . anxiety , depression ) commonly co-occur MTBI . ISTS also include access usual care web-based print educational material . The 12 phone call include ISTS administer 6-month period . UC usual care provide service member attend Traumatic Brain Injury ( TBI ) Clinics Madigan Army Medical Center Womack Army Medical Center , plus web-based education 12 mailing educational material 6-month period . Subjects complete major assessment study entry 6 month 12 month later . The primary aim study compare effect ISTS UC post-concussive symptom emotional distress 6-month assessment . The investigator predict participant receive ISTS report low level post-concussive symptom emotional distress 6-month assessment . Secondary aim include compare long term effect ISTS UC 12-month assessment , well compare effect outcomes post-traumatic stress symptom , quality life , resilience , work activity .
DOC.brief_title: CONcussion Treatment After Combat Trauma ( CONTACT )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Active military National Guard/Reserve status 2 . Enrollment within 2 year return Operation Enduring Freedom/Operation Iraqi Freedom ( OEF/OIF ) theater subsequent operation . 3 . Positive response screen postdeployment examination positive response question 1,2 , 6 `` 2 + 10 Traumatic Brain Injury ( TBI ) Screening Questionnaire '' positive response question 1c , 4,5 , 6 Military Acute Concussion Evaluation ( correspond critical section Centers Disease Control operational definition Mild Traumatic Brain Injury ( MTBI ) ) 4 . Has access telephone . 1 . Moderate severe TBI ( Glasgow Coma Scale < 13 ) require hospitalization 2 . Active psychotic disorder ( include schizophrenia schizoaffective disorder ) , severe depression active suicidal ideation TBI clinic visit , current bipolar disorder history . 3 . Enrollment intensive treatment TBI program Madigan Womack Army Medical Center
